Stephen is one of those "can/will do" engineers you just have to have in your arsenal when taking on daunting tasks and new challenges.  His passion for continual learning to better himself is evident high quality of his work and by the strong relationships he develops with coworkers and customers.  He is truly a solid stand up guy that can be relied on to do whatever is necessary in order to get the job done!

Stephen has a great communication skills and an astounding knowledge of unix and tcp/ip based services. He for sure is able to resolve any task I can think of. I have found Stephen to be a marvelous team player, who stays familiar with the most recent changes or improvements in the development libraries utilized in any project (including QA ones) in AOL. His extensions to the build system become a standard accepted by other engineers in the company.

Steve is a very intelligent problem solver.  We would often delve deeply into projects at the start and Steve was able to analyze a situation from many perspectives including the customers.  What impresses me most about Steve is his work ethic, he would generally have his projects done ahead of my expectations and would often work extra hours to ensure our customers were fully supported.  I can strongly recommend Steve without any reservations.

Steve is single-handedly one of the most well-rounded people I have ever worked with. He carries a very sound and thorough understanding of the intricacies of software development; and he has a talent for being able to sniff out problems before they do indeed, become problems. In working with him for 2 years, I found that Steve requires minimal supervision, the quality of his work is superb, and his ability to maintain an even-keel through the toughest of meetings and projects showed his 'lead by example' nature. I can only hope to have the opportunity to work with Steve, or anyone like him, again in my career.

Sunil is an talented programmer who has always been able to produce quality work on time or ahead of schedule. He took on and mastered whatever we threw at him and always produced excellent solutions. We counted on him to support our web site and integrate it with our build system which required an unlikely mix of JSP and Perl CGI, and he did extremely well. I definitely recommend him for any shop which values hard work and fast results!

I have worked with Naran for about six years, and wish I could work with him another six. His problem solving skills are excellent. When we want something done quickly and well, we can give it to Naran and rest assured it would be taken care of. He is always upbeat and cheerful, and is a respected and valuable member of our team. If you are considering him for your team, get him while you can! You won't be sorry.

summary: Software engineering professional with more than 16 years proven experience designing, building and testing small and large-scale systems. Particularly interested in the design of server-client systems. Extensive experience integrating open source software into the work process.Specialties: C, C++, Perl, Ruby and PHP languages under Linux, Solaris, Mac OS and Windows. PostgreSQL, MySQL and Sybase database management systems. Apache Web Server. Git, CVS and Subversion revision control systems.
